title: Set 'Samaj Ki Seva Mein Samarpit' stat counter to zero

requirements.summary: Set the 'समाज की सेवा में समर्पित' (Dedicated to Social Service) stat value to 0 in the AboutSection component
acceptanceCriteria: The stat card or counter labeled 'समाज की सेवा में समर्पित' (or equivalent) displays 0 as its value.
No other stat values or UI elements are changed.
The change is visible on the live page without requiring a data refresh.

file_operations.description: Locate the stat counter for 'समाज की सेवा में समर्पित' (Dedicated to Social Service) within the AboutSection component and change its numeric value to 0. Keep all other stats, styling, and content unchanged.
